 This is ofstream variable represents sgf output file.

class T_searcher

Detailed Description

Class managing creating output sgf file.

This class stores information about sgf output ( filename , fstream , ... ) and provides functions to for operating the output sgf file.

Member Function Documentation

string coordinates_to_string ( Coordinates  coordinates_  ) 

Transforms coordinates to string.

Parameters:
[in] coordinates_ Input coordinates.
Returns:
[out] Returns string value for sgf output of given coordinates.

Input coordinates are transformed to string which might be directly printed into the sgf output. Pass move is handled properly.

void print_comment ( bool  blockable  ) 

Prints comment with all neccessities.

Parameters:
[in] blockable Blockable switcher.

Prints content of Sgf_printer::buff into the sgf output in a form of comment ( adds comment tags ). If blockable switcher is set to true and -to option is not given, than Sgf_printer::buff is cleared and no output is generated : this is to distinguish important output ( might not be blocked ) from the extended .

Prints initial position to the sgf output.

Prints initial position given as a point_board.

Prints sgf header.

Parameters:
[in] stone_color_to_move_ Represents a player who is to make a first move.

Mehthod prints neccessary sgf header to the sgf output.

void print_to_file ( string  str  ) 

Prints string to file.

Parameters:
[in] str Input string to be printed. Prints given string directly to the output file.
void set_output ( string  file_name  )  [inline]

Assigns output file to the Sgf_printer::sgf_out.

Parameters:
[in] file_name Filename of the output file.

This method assings Sgf_printer::sgf_out file to print the output to. If there is not a file of given file_name, then it is created.
